text: Yugen-kai no kagi wa kare no omoto ni ari, kare no soto ni wa dare mo kore o shiranai. Kare wa riku to umi ni aru subete no mono o shitte ora reru. Ichi-mai no konoha demo, kare ga sore o shirazu ni ochiru koto wa naku, mata daichi no kurayami no naka no hitotsubu no kokumotsu demo, seiki ga aru no ka, matawa karete iru no ka, meiryona ten no sho no naka ni nai mono wa nai nodearu
